title: Virgin No More: Anal Annie
description: OverviewAnnie, a nineteen year old college student, is determined to keep her virginity until she is married. After going on with her new boyfriend Zach on a couple dates, he pressures her to have sex with him. When she refuses, he comes up with an idea that will keep her virginity intact - anal sex.She agrees and soon begins to enjoy having Zach show her all this attention and no longer feel pressured to give up her most precious gift. However, she is soon introduced to Zach's father, a hot older version of Zach himself. After they meet, his father decides that he must have the young Annie.Can Annie keep her virginity after being pressured by her boyfriend's dad to give it up to him?
author: J.M. Christopher
